<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiendish Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=1692) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) if you don't already have it, and you gain the [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) trait and the trait appropriate to the type of servitor you've become (such as [daemon](/Traits.aspx?ID=213), [demon](/Traits.aspx?ID=42), or [devil](/Traits.aspx?ID=44)).
name: Fiendish Form
